keyMoments.title: Luffy's Emotional Battle for the Flag
keyMoments.description: Luffy battles Brindo while distracted by the emotional weight of the stolen crew flag.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates how much the pirate flag means to the crew's identity.

keyMoments.title: Franky and Nami Trapped
keyMoments.description: Two Straw Hat members become encased in ice, leaving them incapacitated.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew separated and in danger from the Accino Family.

name.japanese: アッチーノファミリー

keyMoments.title: Arbell and Salchow's Coordinated Attacks
keyMoments.description: The married couple demonstrates their synchronized fighting style against Usopp.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases the Accino Family's collaborative combat approach.

keyMoments.title: Hockera Traps Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Even in defeat, Hockera successfully freezes Franky and Nami.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the family's effectiveness as bounty hunters.

keyMoments.title: Alliance with Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: The Phoenix Pirates assist Luffy in capturing Brindo.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the ongoing alliance between the two crews in recovering their flags.
